org.osate.ge.operations

Interface Operation


  • public interface Operation
    Represents an operation. An operation is a sequence of steps. An operation may branch into additional sequences of steps. Steps may modify the model, prompt the user, or perform other operations. The result of the previous step is provided to the followings step. Operations provide a means to perform relatively complex model operations while abstracting how the details regarding how the model is accessed. Operations are important for allowing complex operations using a minimal number of transactions. Operations typically perform any user prompting at the start of the operation to allow the operation to abort before any modifications occur. If an operation contains many modifications, the underlying implementation may aggregate modifications to reduce the number of times the model is locked.
    No Implement:
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

      • createWithBuilder

        static Operation createWithBuilder(java.util.function.Consumer<OperationBuilder<?>> operationBuilder)
        Creates an operation by calling a consumer which will provide an OperationBuilder to use to create the operation.
        Parameters:
        operationBuilder -
        Returns:
        Since:
        2.0

      • createSimple

        static <BusinessObjectType> java.util.Optional<Operation> createSimple(BusinessObjectContext containerToModify,
                                                                       java.lang.Class<BusinessObjectType> containerBoType,
                                                                       java.util.function.Function<BusinessObjectType,StepResult<?>> modifier)
        Create an operation that modifies the business object of the specified business object context. Automatically adds the newly created object to the diagram. The newly created object must be a valid child of the specified business object context.
        Type Parameters:
        BusinessObjectType - is the type of business object being modified
        Parameters:
        containerToModify - is the business object context which is being modified
        containerBoType - is the type of business object expected for the context.
        modifier - is a function that performs the modification operation to the passed in business object.
        Returns:
        an optional containing an operation. If the type of the context's business object does not match the specified type an empty optional will be returned.
        Since:
        2.0

      • createPromptAndModify

        static <BusinessObjectType> Operation createPromptAndModify(java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Optional<BusinessObjectType>> prompter,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<BusinessObjectType,StepResult<?>> modifier)
        Creates an operation that is intended to be used to implement the common pattern of prompting to select the business object to modify.
        Type Parameters:
        BusinessObjectType - is the business object being modified
        Parameters:
        prompter - is a function which returns the business object to be modified. Must not return null.
        modifier - is a function used to modify the model. The argument for this function may not match that which is returned by the prompter. Only the business object passed into this function should be modified.
        Returns:
        the created operation.
        Since:
        2.0

      • createPromptAndModifyWithExtra

        static <BusinessObjectType extends EObject,Extra> Operation createPromptAndModifyWithExtra(java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.Optional<BusinessObjectAndExtra<BusinessObjectType,Extra>>> prompter,
                                                                                           java.util.function.Function<BusinessObjectAndExtra<BusinessObjectType,Extra>,StepResult<?>> modifier)
        Creates an operation that is intended to be used to implement the common pattern of prompting the user to determine the business object to modify and additional arguments.
        Type Parameters:
        BusinessObjectType -
        Extra - is the type of the data beyond the business object to modify which will be collected.
        Parameters:
        prompter - is a function that prompts the user and then provides a business object to modify along with additional data. Must not return null.
        modifier - is a function used to modify the model. The argument for this function may not match that which is returned by the prompter. Only the business object passed into this function should be modified.
        Returns:
        the created operation.
        Since:
        2.0
